info.description: SCPI command metadata for the BK Precision 8616. Ranges and options reflect this model's specifications where available.
notes: Arguments and responses lists are ordered.
Arguments and responses of type str may have a values list for accepted values.
Arguments and responses of type int or float may have a range parameter for min and max.
If a command supports variadic arguments, the last argument will have 'variadic': true.

MEAS:VOLT.help: Query the average DC voltage at the load input

MEAS:CURR.help: Query the average DC current at the load input

MEAS:POW.help: Query the average power at the load input

INP:SHOR.help: Set short circuit function state (0/OFF or 1/ON)

INP:SHOR:STAT.help: Set short circuit function state (0/OFF or 1/ON)

FUNC.help: Select input mode: CURR, VOLT, POW, RES, or IMP

MODE.help: SThis command determines whether the input regulation mode is controlled by values in a list or by the FUNCtion command setting.
